title: Jesus of Nazareth
creator_credit: Franco Zeffirelli, Vincenzo Labella, Radiotelevisione Italiana and ITC
brief_description: Director Franco Zeffirelli’s powerful and compelling epic traces the life of Jesus of Nazareth from Immaculate Conception through to Divine Resurrection. Critically acclaimed and lauded by religious leaders worldwide, a distinguished cast supports Robert Powell and Olivia Hussey in the leading roles of Jesus and Mary.
